scripts.postinstall: node -e "process.exit(process.env.VERCEL?0:1)" || (playwright install --with-deps || npx playwright install || echo "Playwright already installed")
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend i && npm --prefix frontend i
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.test:backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm --prefix backend run dev
scripts.test:frontend: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:4102 npm --prefix frontend run dev -- -p 3003
scripts.build: node -e "process.exit(process.env.VERCEL?0:1)" || (npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build)
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix backend run start" "npm --prefix frontend run start"
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.e2e: npm run e2e:prepare && npm run e2e:start
